publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2474# Rhoda Grant: Relocation of Scottish Natural Heritage—That the Parliament notes the Scottish Executive’s intention to review the location of Scottish Natural Heritage; further notes the progress made by the Executive to disperse public agencies and civil service jobs away from Edinburgh, and considers that the Executive should move Scottish Natural Heritage to the Highlands, an area with which it is particularly closely associated.

S1M-2474# Rhoda Grant: Relocation of Scottish Natural Heritage—That the Parliament notes the Scottish Executive’s intention to review the location of Scottish Natural Heritage; further notes the progress made by the Executive to disperse public agencies and civil service jobs away from Edinburgh, and considers that the Executive should move Scottish Natural Heritage to the Highlands, an area with which it is particularly closely associated.
S1M-2474# Relocation of Scottish Natural Heritage (lodged on 21 November 2001) Bristow Muldoon*, Trish Godman*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Elaine Thomson*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Maureen Macmillan*
S1M-2474# Relocation of Scottish Natural Heritage (lodged on 21 November 2001) Mary Scanlon*
S1M-2474# Relocation of Scottish Natural Heritage (lodged on 21 November 2001) Cathy Peattie*
S1M-2474# Relocation of Scottish Natural Heritage (lodged on 21 November 2001) Mr Jamie Stone*
